thread.title: BRIEF-Avinger To Settle Securities Class Actions For $5 Million

title: BRIEF-Avinger To Settle Securities Class Actions For $5 Million
text: March 21, 2018 / 12:16 PM / in 9 minutes BRIEF-Avinger To Settle Securities Class Actions For $5 Million Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 21 (Reuters) - Avinger Inc: * AVINGER INC - ENTERED INTO BINDING MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING TO SETTLE SECURITIES CLASS ACTIONS PENDING AGAINST CO, SEVERAL OF OFFICERS & DIRECTORSâ€‹ * AVINGER INC SAYS SETTLEMENT IS FOR A TOTAL OF $5 MILLION - SEC FILING * AVINGER INC - COMPANY'S TOTAL CONTRIBUTION TO SETTLEMENT FUND WILL BE $1.76 MILLION AND HAS BEEN ACCRUED AS OF Q4 OF 2017 Source: ( bit.ly/2GNhB9i ) Further company coverage:
